instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2849: What is 820-2849? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.820-2850: What is 820-2850? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.C9560: What is C9560? Tantalum capacitor on 820-2850 logic board that often dies and causes intermittent power to framebuffer PP1V8R1V55_S0GPU_ISNS and PP1V8R1V55_S0GPU_ISNS_R rail, causing GPU kernel panics. Replace with non-tantalum if machine is having random black screen or kernel panics.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2849</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  17" 2010 sometimes grafical problems
threads.message:
hi friends, I just got that device with the hint sometimes grafical problems. 

Is it possible the same thing like on the <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> the <CAPACITOR>C9560</CAPACITOR>?
